definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to dawdle/the name of the father of the Emperor Yao

sentences.english: Sun Quan, fearing for Ling Tong, ordered Lv Meng to bring him back to camp.
sentences.chinese: 孫權恐淩統有失，令呂蒙接應回營。

sentences.english: She would sit in the computer lab at her university and we'd talk into the early morning.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在她的大學的微機室，和我聊天直到淩晨。

sentences.english: We were woken (or wakened) in the early hours of the morning by the shouting of the mob.
sentences.chinese: 淩晨我們被那些鬧事的羣衆的叫喊聲吵醒了。

sentences.english: Ling Shao, Philips Research Laboratories, Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 淩芍，飛利浦研究實驗室，荷蘭。

sentences.english: Water resources is the guarantee and the restricted factor related to the development of Yangling Agriculture High-tech Industries Demonstration Zone.
sentences.chinese: 水資源是楊淩示範區發展的保障和制約因素。

sentences.english: Liang Gui was appointed Secretary of the Party Working Committee of Yangling Demonstration Zone.
sentences.chinese: 任命梁桂爲楊淩示範區黨工委書記。

definition: in large numbers/in force/lit. clouds bubbling up
top gem of pendant from girdle
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
